pkgmetadata.longdescription: The library convert python 'requests' and 'httpx' object in curl command. Curlify2 is a enhancement of [curlify]('https://github.com/ofw/curlify').## InstallationTo install the library use pip or poetry command, see:```bash$ pip install curlify2```or poetry:```bash$ poetry add curlify2```## Usageusing **requests** module:```pythonfrom curlify2 import Curlifyimport requestsURL = "https://run.mocky.io/v3/b0f4ffd8-6696-4f90-8bab-4a3bcad9ef3f"request = requests.get(URL)response = Curlify(request.request)print(response.to_curl()) # curl -X GET -H "User-Agent: python-requests/2.24.0" -H "Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate" -H "Accept: */*" -H "Connection: keep-alive" -d 'None' https://run.mocky.io/v3/b0f4ffd8-6696-4f90-8bab-4a3bcad9ef3f```using **httpx** module:```pythonimport curlify2import httpxURL = "https://run.mocky.io/v3/b0f4ffd8-6696-4f90-8bab-4a3bcad9ef3f"request = httpx.get(URL)response = Curlify(request.request)print(response.to_curl()) # curl -X GET -H "User-Agent: python-requests/2.24.0" -H "Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate" -H "Accept: */*" -H "Connection: keep-alive" -d 'None' https://run.mocky.io/v3/b0f4ffd8-6696-4f90-8bab-4a3bcad9ef3f```
